mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chatting (chatting_room_id, user_no, join_at, use_yn) VALUES (#{chattingRoomId}, #{userNo}, #{joinAt}, #{useYn})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT c.user_no, u.user_name FROM chatting c JOIN users u ON c.user_no = u.user_no WHERE c.chatting_room_id = #{chattingRoomId};

SELECT c.chatting_room_id, GROUP_CONCAT(u.user_name SEPARATOR ', ') AS userNames FROM chatting c JOIN users u ON c.user_no = u.user_no WHERE c.use_yn = 'Y' AND c.chatting_room_id IN ( SELECT chatting_room_id FROM chatting WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND use_yn = 'Y' ) GROUP BY c.chatting_room_id;
